public void write(byte[] b, int off, int len) throws IOException {
    synchronized (lock) {
        ensureOpen();
        if ((off < 0) || (off > b.length) || (len < 0) ||
            ((off + len) > b.length) || ((off + len) < 0)) {
            throw new IndexOutOfBoundsException();
        } else if (len == 0) {
            return;
        }
        int n = 0;
        while (n < len) {
            int count = write(b, off + n, len - n);
            if (count <= 0)
                break;
            n += count;
        }
        if (n < len)
            throw new IOException("write(" + len + " bytes) failed: " +
                                  "only " + n + " bytes written");
    }
}
